LanguageData.WoolAngelhair.label: angel wool
LanguageData.WoolAngelhair.description: Mysterious soft wool taken from an equally mysterious creature.
LanguageData.EggAngelhairUnfertilized.label: angelhair egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggAngelhairUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized angelhair egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggAngelhairFertilized.label: angelhair egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggAngelhairFertilized.description: A fertilized angelhair egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby angelhair. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
